Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.pawns

Class Pawns

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.pawns.Pawns
public class Pawns extends Object
This class represents students (and professors) that are used in this game. Pawns is a Map between PawnColor and the number of students (or professor) in every location.

    • Pawns

      public Pawns(int green, int red, int yellow, int pink, int blue)
      Constructs a new Pawns and initializes every PawnColor at the number passed as parameter.
      Parameters:
      green - the number of green pawns
      red - the number of red pawns
      yellow - the number of yellow pawns
      pink - the number of pink pawns
      blue - the number of blue pawns
